app.title: App
app.description: Configuration of an default app that is part of the cluster.

extraConfigs.title: Extra config maps or secrets
extraConfigs.description: Extra config maps or secrets that will be used to customize to the app. The desired values must be under configmap or secret key 'values'. The values are merged in the order given, with the later values overwriting earlier, and then inline values overwriting those. Resources must be in the same namespace as the cluster.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Specifies whether the resource is a config map or a secret.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the config map or secret. The object must exist in the same namespace as the cluster App.

values.title: Values
values.description: Values to be passed to the app. Values will have higher priority than values from configmaps.

helmRelease.title: App
helmRelease.description: Configuration of a default app that is part of the cluster and is deployed as a HelmRelease resource.

extraConfigs.title: Extra config maps or secrets
extraConfigs.description: Extra config maps or secrets that will be used to customize to the app. The desired values must be under configmap or secret key 'values'. The values are merged in the order given, with the later values overwriting earlier, and then inline values overwriting those. Resources must be in the same namespace as the cluster.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Specifies whether the resource is a config map or a secret.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the config map or secret. The object must exist in the same namespace as the cluster App.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: Optional marks this ValuesReference as optional. When set, a not found error for the values reference is ignored, but any ValuesKey, TargetPath or transient error will still result in a reconciliation failure.

values.title: Values
values.description: Values to be passed to the app. Values will have higher priority than values from configmaps.

encryptionAtHost.title: Encryption at host
encryptionAtHost.description: Enable encryption at host for the worker nodes.

cluster.title: Cluster
cluster.description: Helm values for the provider-independent cluster chart.

global.title: Global
global.description: Properties that are available to all charts and subcharts.

apps.title: Apps
apps.description: Configuration of apps that are part of the cluster.

components.title: Components
components.description: Advanced configuration of components that are running on all nodes.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not the Auditd service shall be enabled. When true, the Auditd service is enabled. When false, the Auditd service is disabled.

containerRegistries.title: Container registries
containerRegistries.description: Endpoints and credentials configuration for container registries.

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Base64-encoded string from the concatenation of the username, a colon, and the password.

identitytoken.title: Identity token
identitytoken.description: Used to authenticate the user and obtain an access token for the registry.

password.title: Password
password.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

username.title: Username
username.description: Used to authenticate for the registry with username/password.

enabled.title: Enable local registry caches
enabled.description: Flag to enable local registry cache.

mirroredRegistries.title: Registries to cache locally
mirroredRegistries.description: A list of registries that should be cached.

port.title: Local port for the registry cache
port.description: Port for the local registry cache under: http://127.0.0.1:<PORT>.

managementClusterRegistryCache.title: Management cluster registry cache
managementClusterRegistryCache.description: Caching container registry on a management cluster level.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enabling this will configure containerd to use management cluster's Zot registry service. To make use of it as a pull-through cache, you also have to specify registries to cache images for.

mirroredRegistries.title: Registries to cache
mirroredRegistries.description: Here you must specify each registry to cache container images for. Please also make sure to have an entry for each registry in Global > Components > Containerd > Container registries.

allowedCIDRs.title: List of CIDRs which have to been allowed to connect to the API Server endpoint

applicationSecurityGroups.title: Application security groups
applicationSecurityGroups.description: ApplicationSecurityGroups specifies the Application security group in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.

customNetworkInterfaceName.title: Custom network interface name
customNetworkInterfaceName.description: CustomNetworkInterfaceName specifies the network interface name associated with the private endpoint.

manualApproval.title: Manual approval
manualApproval.description: ManualApproval specifies if the connection approval needs to be done manually or not. Set it true when the network admin does not have access to approve connections to the remote resource.

name.title: Name of the private endpoint (must be unique in the resource group)

privateIPAddresses.title: Private IP addresses
privateIPAddresses.description: PrivateIPAddresses specifies the IP addresses for the network interface associated with the private endpoint. They have to be part of the subnet where the private endpoint is linked.

groupIDs.title: Group IDs
groupIDs.description: GroupIDs specifies the ID(s) of the group(s) obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name specifies the name of the private link service.

requestMessage.title: Request message
requestMessage.description: RequestMessage specifies a message passed to the owner of the remote resource with the private endpoint connection request.

routeTableName.title: ControlPlane route table name
routeTableName.description: Name of the control plane route table.

subnetName.title: ControlPlane subnet name
subnetName.description: Name of the control plane subnet.

hostCidr.title: Node subnet
hostCidr.description: IPv4 address range for nodes, in CIDR notation.

mode.title: Network mode
mode.description: Specifying if the cluster resources are publicly accessible or not.

items.title: Pod subnet
items.description: IPv4 address range for pods, in CIDR notation.

nodeCidrMaskSize.title: Node CIDR mask size
nodeCidrMaskSize.description: The size of the mask that is used for the node CIDR. The node CIDR is a sub-range of the pod CIDR and so the mask size and pod CIDR must be chosen such that there is enough space for the maximum number of nodes in the cluster.

items.title: Service subnet
items.description: IPv4 address range for kubernetes services, in CIDR notation.

natGatewayName.title: Nodes subnet nat-gateway name
natGatewayName.description: Name of the nat gateway on the nodes subnet.

applicationSecurityGroups.title: Application security groups
applicationSecurityGroups.description: ApplicationSecurityGroups specifies the Application security group in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.

customNetworkInterfaceName.title: Custom network interface name
customNetworkInterfaceName.description: CustomNetworkInterfaceName specifies the network interface name associated with the private endpoint.

manualApproval.title: Manual approval
manualApproval.description: ManualApproval specifies if the connection approval needs to be done manually or not. Set it true when the network admin does not have access to approve connections to the remote resource.

name.title: Name of the private endpoint (must be unique in the resource group)

privateIPAddresses.title: Private IP addresses
privateIPAddresses.description: PrivateIPAddresses specifies the IP addresses for the network interface associated with the private endpoint. They have to be part of the subnet where the private endpoint is linked.

groupIDs.title: Group IDs
groupIDs.description: GroupIDs specifies the ID(s) of the group(s) obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name specifies the name of the private link service.

requestMessage.title: Request message
requestMessage.description: RequestMessage specifies a message passed to the owner of the remote resource with the private endpoint connection request.

routeTableName.title: Nodes route table name
routeTableName.description: Name of the nodes route table.

encryptionAtHost.title: Encryption at host
encryptionAtHost.description: Enable encryption at host for the control plane nodes.

caPem.title: Certificate authority
caPem.description: Identity provider's CA certificate in PEM format.

internal.title: Internal
internal.description: For Giant Swarm internal use only, not stable, or not supported by UIs.

hashSalt.title: Hash salt
hashSalt.description: If specified, this token is used as a salt to the hash suffix of some resource names. Can be used to force-recreate some resources.

managementCluster.title: The capi MC managing this cluster

description.title: Cluster description
description.description: User-friendly description of the cluster's purpose.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: These labels are added to the Kubernetes resources defining this cluster.

name.title: Cluster name
name.description: Unique identifier, cannot be changed after creation.

servicePriority.title: Service priority
servicePriority.description: The relative importance of this cluster.

nodePools.title: Node pools
nodePools.description: Node pools of the cluster. If not specified, this defaults to the value of `cluster.providerIntegration.workers.defaultNodePools`.

additionalResourceTags.title: Additional resource tags
additionalResourceTags.description: Additional tags to be added to the resource group and to all resources in it.

allowedSubscriptions.title: List of Azure Subscription IDs that are allowed to work on this cluster

azureClusterIdentity.title: Identity
azureClusterIdentity.description: AzureClusterIdentity resource to use for this cluster.

identityClientID.title: Identity Client ID
identityClientID.description: Identity Client ID - only necessary for management clusters.

network.title: Azure network settings
network.description: Azure VNet peering and other Azure-specific network settings.

peerings.title: VNet peerings
peerings.description: Specifying VNets (their resource groups and names) to which the peering is established.

remoteVnetName.title: VNet name
remoteVnetName.description: Name of the remote VNet to which the peering is established.

resourceGroup.title: Resource group name
resourceGroup.description: Resource group for the remote VNet to which the peering is established.

subscriptionId.title: Subscription ID
subscriptionId.description: ID of the Azure subscription this cluster will run in.

release.title: Release
release.description: Information about the workload cluster release.

evictionMinimumReclaim.title: Default settings for eviction minimum reclaim

hardEvictionThresholds.title: Default settings for hard eviction thresholds

softEvictionGracePeriod.title: Default settings for soft eviction grace period

softEvictionThresholds.title: Default settings for soft eviction thresholds

network.title: Network configuration
network.description: Internal network configuration that is susceptible to more frequent change

vnet.title: VNet spec
vnet.description: Existing VNet configuration. This is susceptible to more frequent change or removal.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group where the existing VNet is deployed.
